pageContext.claim: “So we're being very, very tough at the border. In fact, until just recently, we had a 70-year low coming through.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is referring to southwest border apprehensions by the Border Patrol. During his first year in office, these numbers had reached a nearly 47-year low, not a 70-year low. In any case, this trend no longer holds; apprehensions have been rising quickly during Trump's second year in office.
